name: UIFontPickerViewController
desc: A view controller that manages the interface for selecting a font that the system provides or the user installs.

items.name: init(configuration: UIFontPickerViewController.Configuration)
items.desc: Creates a controller for a font picker view.

items.name: var configuration: UIFontPickerViewController.Configuration
items.desc: Settings for fonts the font picker should offer to the user and how to display those fonts.

items.name: class UIFontPickerViewController.Configuration
items.desc: The filters and display settings a font picker view controller uses to set up a font picker.

items.name: var delegate: UIFontPickerViewControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The object that handles messages about the user’s interaction with a font picker.

items.name: protocol UIFontPickerViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: A set of optional methods for receiving messages about the user’s interaction with the font picker.

items.name: var selectedFontDescriptor: UIFontDescriptor?
items.desc: Information about the font family or face selected by the user in the font picker.
